analysis.key_quote: Attempting to reclassify tens of thousands of government jobs as “policymaking positions” and therefore subject to presidential appointment and removal of those who occupy these positions will make positions at NIH/NSF political instead of bipartisan positions.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization of federal positions, the loss of merit-based hiring, and the potential destruction of scientific integrity, which aligns with the themes of opposition to the rule.
